item.title: Email Management System Performance Optimization Project
item.description: Email Management System Performance Optimization Project Executive Summary This report documents the successful optimization of our fundraising platform’s email management system.

item.title: Learning SQL
item.description: #data #SQL What is SQL? Structured Query Language (SQL pronounced S Q L or Sequel) is a language focused in access and manipulating Databases, it became an ANSI standard in 1986 and ISO in 1987.
